Today’s 20% discount knocks another $23 off, bringing it back down to its lowest price of the year. This is one of the lowest prices we have tracked for this variant, and it’s now within $1 of its all-time low. The 2TB variant of this SSD is also down to one of its lowest prices at $149.99 shipped. items.title: Microsoft is bringing its Windows engineering teams back together again
items.summary: Windows is coming back together. Microsoft is bringing its key Windows engineering teams under a single organization again, as part of a reorg being announced today. Windows chief Pavan Davuluri, who was just promoted to president of Windows and devices earlier this month, shared the changes to Microsoft's Windows teams in an internal memo. "This […]

items.title: Tile’s lack of encryption could make tracker owners vulnerable to stalking
items.summary: Security researchers are shining the spotlight on a serious security vulnerability that could enable stalkers to track victims using their own Tile tags, as well as other unwanted violations of security and privacy. Research outlined by Wired shows that Tile’s anti-theft mode, which makes its trackers “invisible” on the Tile network, counteracts measures to prevent […]

items.title: California Governor Newsom signs landmark AI safety bill SB 53
items.summary: SB 53 requires large AI labs – including OpenAI, Anthropic, Meta, and Google DeepMind – to be transparent about safety protocols. It also ensures whistleblower protections for employees at those companies.

items.title: All-new Anker 25W 3-in-1 MagSafe Charging Stand with color display releases today with launch deals
items.summary:
As you likely already know from our recent coverage, the all-new Anker Prime charging gear is officially arriving today, including a launch deal on its new 25W Prime MagSafe Charger. The new display-equipped 3-in-1 magnetic charging stand is up for sale on Amazon with a solid launch discount up for grabs after clipping the on-page coupon.

items.title: Launch deals on all of Apple’s new releases: Apple Watch Series 11/Ultra 3, iPhone 17 cases, wallets, 25W charger, more
items.summary:
Apple unleashed its new AirPods Pro 3 last week alongside the new Apple Watch models – Series 11, Ultra 3, and SE 3 – not to mention a host of new accessories for iPhone 17, 17 Pro, 17 Pro Max, and the new iPhone Air. While we are still awaiting the return of the light launch deal on the new AirPods, just about everything else Apple released this month is now seeing launch deals at Amazon and we have collected all of it for you below.

items.summary:
L LAVAREDO Minimalist Watch

Buy for $25 (Reg. $28)

What we love

When it comes to watches, I gravitate towards the more simplistic designs. That’s why this model caught my eye, well, that and the price. There are loads of styles to pick from, but each has a limited quantity on sale at this price. Once those sell out, the price will pop back up.

Today Anker unleashed its all-new 2025 range of Prime charging gear, complete with onboard displays, 25W MagSafe action, and more. We have already detailed the early launch deals right here, as well as a feature on the brand new 25W 3-in-1 MagSafe Charging Stand with onboard cooling, a display of its own, and the companion app, but now we are taking a look at the launch deal on, what is for many, another highlight from the new releases – the Anker Prime Power Bank (26K, 300W). Details below.

items.title: Frank founder Charlie Javice sentenced to 7 years in prison for defrauding JPMorgan Chase
items.summary: The fintech startup had been acquired by JPMorgan Chase in 2021 for $175 million. The bank later accused Frank of lying about its customer base.

items.title: Might as well tidy up your vehicle while this collapsible trunk organizer is only $10 (Save 41%)
items.summary:
HOTOR Collapsible Trunk Organizer

Buy for $10 (Reg. $17)

What we love

I’ve had a trunk organizer like this in my vehicle for a couple of years now and it comes in handy probably twice a month. It’s a great way to keep things from rolling around in the trunk while also keeping everything tidy. This particular unit spans roughly 21 by 13 by 11 inches in size.

items.title: PlayStation is getting a big, fancy art book full of unused designs
items.summary: It’s been 30 years since the original PlayStation was released in North America and Europe after first debuting in Japan nine months earlier. items.title: Explosion, vehicle fire rock Faraday Future’s LA headquarters
items.summary: There were no injuries, but the building has been deemed unfit for occupation. Faraday's landlord is currently trying to find a new tenant as the EV startup's lease is expiring.

items.title: Watch: Trump and Netanyahu outline peace plan to end war in Gaza
items.summary: The deal proposes an end to military operations, a release of Israeli hostages by Hamas and the immediate delivery of aid to Gaza.

items.summary:
Anker 15-in-1 USB-C Surge Protector

Buy for $23 (Reg. $30)

What we love

While we routinely cover surge protector markdowns around here for less, some folks prefer to spend a bit more and opt for something from the likes of Anker and others. If you’re in that boat, then this deal is for you. This unit boasts a total of 12 AC outlets, two USB-A, and one 20W Type-C, all of which are backed by 2,100J surge protection.

items.title: Score a rare discount on the Breville Smart Grinder Pro to up your espresso game at 20% off
items.summary:
I’m totally fine using old school drip brewers, maybe some pour-over once in a while, and am a big fan of the Nespresso pod systems, but there’s seriously nothing like a freshly ground cup of espresso or Americano. Today at Amazon we are tracking a relatively rare chance to save on the popular Breville Smart Grinder Pro to help you do just that – a few different colors are back at the lowest price of the year on Amazon right now.

items.title: Early fall Prime Day Amazon Echo smart speaker deals now live from $25 (Up to 50% off)
items.summary:
Amazon has now kicked off its early Prime Big Deal Days sale, and we are now tracking notable price drops across the Echo smart speaker lineup. Much like we saw from the July Prime Day event, Amazon is delivering discounts on its latest slate of smart speakers well ahead of the main sale this year – prices start from $25 with free shipping for Prime members or in orders over $35.

items.title: Drop two clear pull-out organizers under the sink while they’re $13 each (36% off)
items.summary:
Delamu Clear Under-Sink Pull-Out Organizers (2-pack)

Buy for $25.50 (Reg. $40)

What we love

Unlike a lot of the under-sink organizers we come across, these feature a straight forward setup process that doesn’t require screws or adhesive strips. The feet have an anti-slip pad that helps keep them locked in place while you pull the drawers in and out.

more…

items.title: Stuck with USB-A? Make the most of it with this retractable 3-in-1 cable down at $9.50 (Save 27%)
items.summary:
LISEN 3-in-1 Retractable USB Cable

Buy for $9.50 (Reg. $13)

What we love

Some big ticket products have USB-A ports and you can’t really do much about it. You can use an adapter to switch it to USB-C, but you can also pick up a 3-in-1 cable like this too. Once plugged in you’ll have micro USB, Type-C, and Lightning cables at your disposal. I like the retractable design here that allows it to be small and compact until you need it.

more…

items.title: Tested: UGREEN’s ‘world’s first’ Qi2.2 25W MagSafe power bank with USB-C cable has become my go-to portable charger [Deal]
items.summary:
There’s no shortage of MagSafe power banks out there these days, but this UGREEN 10,000mAh MagFlow model stands out for a big reason – it’s the world’s first Qi2.2-certified 25W portable charger. Even now – a couple of months after its debut – there aren’t many 25W Qi2 power banks readily available on the market, which makes this unit all the more remarkable. I’ve been carrying it as part of my EDC for a couple of weeks, and it’s quickly become my everyday go-to. Here’s everything you need to know about it in case you’re planning to pick one of these up.
